import React from 'react' import styles from './styles/Card.module.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Card = (props) => { const { name, img, genres, id } = props const { card, cardImage, h3 } = styles return (

{name?.length > 24 ? name.slice(0, 23) : name}
{genres}
) } export default Card
